Name: Containers, or Zones , URL: /wiki/Solaris_Containers
Maximum host cores / CPUs: No theoretical limit (largest SPARC has 384 physical cores)

Name: VirtualBox , URL: /wiki/VirtualBox
Maximum number of SCSI + IDE disks per V: 4 IDE; no limit for SATA, SCSI, SAS
Maximum disk size per VM guest: GUI: 2 TB Command line: no limit
